Dear Patrick, 

Hope you are doing well.

It would be a pleasure to meet with Mr. Ashok and provide the necessary feedback.

Dear Katya,

Regarding the scheduling, I am available for an in-person meeting at our offices anytime on or after Tuesday, April 22nd.

Alternatively, should a meeting be required next week (April 14th-18th), I can gladly conduct the introductory meeting via MS Teams with Mr. Sardana and will advise accordingly.

Could you kindly coordinate with Mr. Ashok's assistant, Jacinta, to arrange the meeting based on these options? 

Please let me know if you require any further information from my side.

Thank You & Best Regards,
Hagop

Subject: Meeting with Mr Ashok Sardana.

 

Hi Katya,

 

It was a pleasure speaking with you this afternoon.

 

As discussed, I’d love to arrange a meeting between Mr. Chalhoub and Mr. Ashok, our Founder and Managing Director. Mr. Ashok is keen to connect for a casual conversation—no set agenda, just an opportunity to meet, exchange ideas, and see if there’s common ground. This could be over coffee, at his office, or ours; whatever works best.

 

Let me know when Mr. Chalhoub would be available, and I’d be happy to coordinate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

Hi Katya,

 

It was a pleasure speaking with you this afternoon.

 

As discussed, I’d love to arrange a meeting between Mr. Chalhoub and Mr. Ashok, our Founder and Managing Director. Mr. Ashok is keen to connect for a casual conversation—no set agenda, just an opportunity to meet, exchange ideas, and see if there’s common ground. This could be over coffee, at his office, or ours; whatever works best.

 

Let me know when Mr. Chalhoub would be available, and I’d be happy to coordinate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

From: Ashok Support <ashoksupport@cfsgroup.com <mailto:ashoksupport@cfsgroup.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, 4 March 2025 12:42 PM
To: Katya Bouabbas <Katya.Bouabbas@chalhoub.com <mailto:Katya.Bouabbas@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Meeting with Mr Ashok Sardana.

 

Hi Katya,

 

It was a pleasure speaking with you this afternoon.

 

As discussed, I’d love to arrange a meeting between Mr. Chalhoub and Mr. Ashok, our Founder and Managing Director. Mr. Ashok is keen to connect for a casual conversation—no set agenda, just an opportunity to meet, exchange ideas, and see if there’s common ground. This could be over coffee, at his office, or ours; whatever works best.

 

Let me know when Mr. Chalhoub would be available, and I’d be happy to coordinate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

Hi Katya,

 

It was a pleasure speaking with you this afternoon.

 

As discussed, I’d love to arrange a meeting between Mr. Chalhoub and Mr. Ashok, our Founder and Managing Director. Mr. Ashok is keen to connect for a casual conversation—no set agenda, just an opportunity to meet, exchange ideas, and see if there’s common ground. This could be over coffee, at his office, or ours; whatever works best.

 

Let me know when Mr. Chalhoub would be available, and I’d be happy to coordinate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

Continental is a business name used by a number of Continental Group companies.

Continental Insurance Brokers LLC (Registration Number: 088) is regulated by the Central Bank of the UAE and licensed to conduct insurance brokerage activities. Registered head office is located at office No 505, Level 5, Bay square 11, Dubai, UAE and the branch office at Office 1104, 11th Floor Hamdan Street, (Hamdan & Salam Corner- Abdullah Darwish Building), Abu Dhabi, UAE.

 

Continental Financial Services LLC  (Registration Numbers: 608026, 20200000091)  is regulated by the Securities and Commodities Authority (SCA), UAE and regulated to conduct business activities of ‘Financial Analysis and Financial Consultation’ and ‘Product Promotion'. Registered head office is located at No 503, Level 5, Bay Square 11. Dubai, UAE.

 

CFS (DIFC) Limited (Registration Number: CL5696) is regulated by the Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA) and licensed to conduct the regulated financial services activities of ‘Advising on Financial Products’ and ‘Arranging Deals in Investments’. CFS is incorporated in the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC).  Registered office is located at Unit 1102B, Level 11, Burj Daman, Dubai International Financial Centre, United Arab Emirates.

Hi Katya,

 

It was a pleasure speaking with you this afternoon.

 

As discussed, I’d love to arrange a meeting between Mr. Chalhoub and Mr. Ashok, our Founder and Managing Director. Mr. Ashok is keen to connect for a casual conversation—no set agenda, just an opportunity to meet, exchange ideas, and see if there’s common ground. This could be over coffee, at his office, or ours; whatever works best.

 

Let me know when Mr. Chalhoub would be available, and I’d be happy to coordinate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,
